interpretation:
The flag of Malta represents the Mediterranean island nation of Malta, known for its rich history and cultural diversity. This card symbolizes courage in the face of adversity and the ability to overcome obstacles. It reminds us to be proud of our heritage and to embrace our unique cultural identity. The colors of the flag, red and white, represent the bravery and purity of the Maltese people.

In a reading, this card may indicate a need to tap into your inner strength and resilience. It may suggest the need to stand up for yourself or others in the face of injustice. It may also represent a connection to history and tradition, urging you to honor your roots and cultural heritage.

Overall, the flag of Malta card encourages us to embrace our courage and cultural identity, and to draw strength from our unique history and heritage.
